events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund immediately because it does not meet my requirements.
The customer issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to keywords such as 'refund' and 'request a refund'.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request shared by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and details about the issue?
Could you please confirm the reason why you want to return the product and if the item is unopened or used, this will help us to process your request faster.
The product is exactly as described but it just doesn’t suit my needs, so it’s unopened and in perfect condition. My order number is 123456789.

Thank you for the information. We can start the refund process right away. Please send the product back using our prepaid return label and once we receive it, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response. I will ship the product back today using the label you provide.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure that you have received the refund successfully. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support, and we hope to assist you again in the future.
We have sent you a brief satisfaction survey. Your feedback is appreciated to help us improve our services.
